gus_bill¶

__init__¶

models¶

class gus2.gus_bill.models.bill[source]¶

Used to keep track of billing for groups. Does not make payments or handle money.

create_bill(Bname, Bvalue, Ggroup, Guser)¶
get_bill(Bname, Ggroup, Guser)¶
modify_bill(Bname, Bvalue, Ggroup, Guser)[source]¶

tests¶

This file runs unit tests on the gus_bill/models.py file.

class gus2.gus_bill.tests.SimpleTest(methodName='runTest')[source]¶
test_create_bill()¶

Tests that the bill was created. This bill will be named test The user will be u1 The group will be g1 The initial value will be 11

test_get_bill()¶

Tests that get_bill returns the right bill

test_modify_bill()¶

Tests that the bill from test_create_bill Can be modified
